metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Ingredients: •
1 cup cottage cheese • 1/2 cup fresh berries •
1 tablespoon honey Instructions: • In a bowl, combine cottage cheese and fresh berries. • Drizzle with honey. • Serve immediately.

A vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering includes gluten-free items . The recipe includes couscous, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese . Gluten-free dishes are written in detail for a Food Contractor whose task is to prepare a vegetarian-free dinner menu . The dish is a vegetarian buffet style menu for corporate gatherings . The menu includes gluten free items . For more information, visit http://www.vegetarian-menu.com/glutenfree-menu-guests .

4 slices of cheddar cheese, 8 slices bread and 4 slices mozzarella cheese . 1/4 cup butter . Cook sandwiches in a skillet until golden brown and cheese is melted . Serve warm with a slice of cheese between two slices of bread, buttered side out of the bread . Gluten-free sandwiches can be ordered by a Food Contractor for a corporate gathering . For confidential support call the Samaritans on 08457 90 90 90, visit a local Samaritans branch or click here for details .

Ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1/2 cup milk, 3 eggs, 3 teaspoons of salt and 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg . 1 cup grated cheese . 1 small onion . Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15 minutes until cheese is melted . Sauté sliced onion in butter until golden in a baking dish, top with cheese . Serve warm with spaetzle and served warm with a slice of onion in a small bowl of ice cream . Spaetzle is a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu .

In a large pot, brown chicken thighs on all sides, then set aside . Sauté onion and garlic until softened . Stir in cumin, cinnamon, and turmeric, then add chicken broth, apricots, and olives . Cover the pot and simmer for 45 minutes until tender . Garnish with parsley and serve over couscous . For a Food Contractor whose task is to Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items .
